entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
